body: These casters are often the children of the priest-king.
name: Boggard Mystics

sections.other_gear: +1 leather armor, mwk club, cloak of resistance +1, 240 gp

spells.druid spells prepared:
(CL 3rd; concentration +5)

2nd-bull's strength, burst of nettles D, summon swarm

1st-entangle (DC 13), hydraulic push, longstrider, shillelagh

0 (at will)-flare (DC 12), guidance, mending, resistance

D domain spell; Domain Swamp

sections.special_qualities: hold breath, nature bond (Swamp domain), nature sense, swamp stride, trackless step, wild empathy +4, woodland stride
sections.name: Boggard Swampseer
sections.skills: Acrobatics +4 (+20 when jumping), Handle Animal +7, Heal +8, Knowledge (nature) +8, Perception +12, Stealth +0 (+8 in swamps), Survival +10, Swim +10
sections.combat_gear: scroll of barkskin, scroll of fog cloud, wand of cure light wounds (30 charges)

sections.other_gear: sling with 10 bullets, cloak of resistance +1, elixir of vision, ring of protection +1, 75 gp

spells.sorcerer spells known:
(CL 4th; concentration +6)

2nd (4/day)-summon monster II

1st (7/day)-burning hands (DC 13), cause fear (DC 13), mage armor, summon monster I

0 (at will)-acid splash, detect magic, detect poison, ghost sound (DC 12), message, resistance

Bloodline abyssal

sections.feats: Combat Casting, Eschew Materials, Improved Initiative, Toughness, Weapon Focus (claw)
sections.special_qualities: bloodline arcana (summoned creatures gain DR 2/good), hold breath, swamp stride
sections.name: Boggard Prophet
sections.skills: Acrobatics +2 (+18 when jumping), Intimidate +6, Knowledge (planes) +5, Perception +3, Spellcraft +7, Stealth +0 (+8 in swamps), Swim +13, Use Magic Device +9
sections.combat_gear: potion of invisibility, scrolls of blindness/deafness (2), scroll of enlarge person
